channel.title: can i set dolphin as root?
channel.description: i need dolphin editor as root to edit system files. i know about nano but this is not very comfortable. is there any way to run dolphin as root?

item.title: can i set dolphin as root?
item.dc:creator: WhoZero
item.description:
it works but there are no icons for the folders or programs visible. only text (Fioldername).
In the terminal this is error : “QPixmap::scaled: Pixmap is a null pixmap”

But i can use dolphin.

Read full topic
item.source: can i set dolphin as root?
